overview: Prior to joining Ambrx, Ms. Cris Calsada had experience in corporate accounting, finance and operations management of companies ranging in size from start-ups to large companies. Most recently she was with Sony Online Entertainment, a worldwide leader in online games where she served as Executive Director of Finance. Prior to Sony Online Entertainment, Ms Calsada served in financial positions with Biotechnology and Healthcare Managment organizations as well as public accounting. Ms. Calsada is a licensed Certified Public Accountant in the State of California and holds a B.S. in Business Administration with an emphasis in Accounting from San Diego State University and a M.B.A. from the University of Southern California.
